name: UnlockJCE
short_description:
UnlockJCE is a Windows batch script which automates the installation of the unlimited strength JCE policy files for Oracle JDK's and JRE's on Windows XP and Windows 7.

By default the jurisdiction policy files distributed with Oracle's Java software have built-in restrictions on available cryptographic strength, due to the import restrictions of some countries.

To remove the restrictions on cryptographic strengths Oracle provides Unlimited Strength Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) Policy Files.

The unlimited strength policy files for Java 1.4 to 1.7 are included with this installer.

UnlockJCE displays a list of Java virtual machines found in the registry and requests to install the JCE unlimited strength policy files to their respective locations.
summary: Unlock Oracle's JDK/JRE restrictions on cryptographic key strength
